docs.text: as the film opens up , expectant unwed mother sally ( played by drew barrymore ) encounters her baby's father in a fast food drive-through window .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: after he gets his milkshake , he drives off , only to be pursued by a military helicopter .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: from this moment forward , you know that this isn't going to be your run-of-the-mill romantic comedy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: home fries tells the tale of the relationship between sally and dorian ( played by luke wilson ) , a helicopter pilot who has a different kind of connection with sally . . . more
docs.label: positive

docs.text: than he would care to admit ( hint : it has something to do with the father of sally's unborn child ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: after taking a personal ( and professional ) interest in her , he finds work at the local fast food restaurant at which she works , and the fun goes on from there .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this movie is a lot of fun .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is comedic on two levels , as a romantic comedy and a dark comedy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the romantic moments are sweet , yet not sappy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: one of the more poignant moments is when dorian accompanies sally to lamaze classes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , the dark comedic moments are more memorable .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is also a tale of revenge , and a funny one at that .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the father of sally's unborn child also happened to be a married man , whose wife is played by catherine o'hara .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she does a wonderful portrayal of a jealous wife who is targeting the person who had an affair , and is not above getting other people to do her dirty work .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ( my apologies if this sounds cryptic , but there is too much of the plot to give away ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: rounding out the cast are jake busey as angus , dorian's overzealous brother and daryl mitchell as roy , dorian's trainer at the fast food restaurant .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the dialogue is sharp and not filled with sappy overtones , even with the romantic nature of the plot .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: if there are any complaints , it is over drew barrymore's performance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: while she does light up the screen , there are moments when she doesn't seem all that convincing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the movie was filmed in texas , and most of the characters have southern texan accents .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: drew barrymore's accent tends to come and go ( luke wilson doesn't seem to have this problem ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as well , she seems awfully agile for a woman that is eight months pregnant .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: still , this movie is one that will please many viewers .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with plot twists galore and hilarious dark moments , this is sure to entertain .
docs.label: positive
